review: I bought this when I got Prime. I've found a lot of good movies and documentaries to watch for free.
author: Wise Thrush

review: More than expected.  Intuitive, Programmable and easy to set up.  I now can get my prime movies with out hassle.
author: John Godfrey

review: I love the fire stick.  I am not tech savvy and managed to get everything installed-it works WONDERFULLY well.The only issue I found was that it was difficult to open the remote hand controller.  I u-tubed and method to be used and it worked just fine.
author: Ellen Turner

review: Well worth the money. Free Prime video has excellent children's programming . Being able to watch some of my old time favorite TV series (Star Trek original)and many others along with the newer stuff whenever I have time is very nice.
author: Nomad

review: Awesome product, no need for a DVD player
author: ObH

review: Easy to use and set up.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Amazing product  I wish I have found out about this earlier
author: Doc Burrage

review: A very good purchase! Easy to set up and use. Still some cost to certain shows and movies, etc. but with Prime membership it is great!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Doesn't get Vudu which I watch almost daily.  All else is fine, but have to knock it down 2 stars for this.  Easy setup.
author: Shaunene McCormack
